our misson

our values

/ Simplicity

A straightforward approach to the planning and production process that keeps progress clear, transparent, and result-driven. This way, our team members, subcontractors, and homeowners are always on the same page.

/ Craftsmanship

The URSUS team members bring old world values to each project, and are united by a quality-driven work ethic. We believe attention to the every detail makes the big picture shine.

/ Relationships

People are at the heart of the work we do, and we love building long-term relationships with our clients, while providing employees and subcontractors with a safe, healthy work environment.

/ Expertise

Our team is made up of professional builders, experienced craftsmen, and responsible sub-contractors, who have years of experience, and care deeply about you and your satisfaction.

/ Integrity

Above all, we do what’s right. We are always honest, and honoring your time frame, budget, and vision is at the very core of our purpose.

/ Passion

We love renovating, remodeling, and building great houses. That’s why we do what we do. So, you can count on a team that cares deeply about you and your outcome.
